trans-unit.source: In accessibility scenarios, represents a header cell in the rendered table of a tabular ASP.NET data-bound control, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: I scenarier med hjälpmedel representerar en rubrikcell i tabellen renderade i en tabellvy ASP.NET databunden kontroll som <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataControlFieldHeaderCell class is used by data tables (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) to represent accessible headers.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataControlFieldHeaderCell används av datatabeller (som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>control) som representerar tillgänglig huvuden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Tabular controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> are considered layout tables, and therefore do not require accessible headers and do not use the DataControlFieldHeaderCell class.
trans-unit.target: Tabell kontroller, till exempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>och <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>anses layouttabeller och kräver därför inte tillgänglig sidhuvuden och Använd inte DataControlFieldHeaderCell klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The DataControlFieldHeaderCell class is used in two cases: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataControlFieldHeaderCell används i båda fallen: – <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>egenskapen är `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The field is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property is set as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Fältet är en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objekt vars <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>-egenskapen anges som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: If neither is the case, a regular DataControlFieldHeaderCell object is used, which renders a `<td>` instead of a `<th>` element.
trans-unit.target: Om varken är fallet, en vanlig DataControlFieldHeaderCell objektet används som gör en `<td>` i stället för en `<th>` element.

trans-unit.source: Because the DataControlFieldHeaderCell class supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> property, it is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control whenever the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom klassen DataControlFieldHeaderCell stöder den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A>egenskapen, det används av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>styr när den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>egenskapen är `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object as the cell's container.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell"> </xref> klass, ställa in den angivna <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objekt som den cellen behållare.

trans-unit.source: The DataControlFieldHeaderCell constructor passes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName> element as its `tagKey` parameter, which is the representation of the HTML tag it is rendered with.
trans-unit.target: DataControlFieldHeaderCell konstruktorn överför den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName>element som dess `tagKey` parametern, som är en representation av renderas med HTML-taggen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> passed in the `containingField` parameter is used to determine whether to show headers and what styles to apply to the cell when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>skickades den `containingField` används för att avgöra om du vill visa rubriker och vad formatmallar ska gälla för cellen när den återges.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> som innehåller den aktiva cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets abbreviated text, which is rendered in an HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_abbr" name="abbr" href=""></xref> attribute and is used by screen readers.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger förkortade texten som återges i ett HTML- <xref uid="langword_csharp_abbr" name="abbr" href=""> </xref> attributet och används av vissa läsare.

trans-unit.source: The value of the AbbreviatedText property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för AbbreviatedText-egenskapen är lagrade i vyn tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: A shortened version of the table header text, which is read by screen readers.
trans-unit.target: En kortare version av tabellens rubriktext som läses av skärmläsare.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Adds information about the table cell to the list of attributes to render.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till information om cellen i listan med attribut som ska renderas.

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute> attributes if the respective <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddAttributesToRender lägger till den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute>attribut om respektive <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A>Egenskaper anges.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream that renders HTML content to the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerar utdataströmmen som renderar HTML-innehåll till klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header cell's scope within an HTML table.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger de rubrikcell-scope i en HTML-tabell.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Scope property is rendered as an HTML `scope` attribute by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> object.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för egenskapen Scope återges som en HTML `scope` attributet med det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: Although the Scope property is initialized to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>, you should set it to either <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>, depending on the cells that the header represents.
trans-unit.target: Även om Scope-egenskapen har initierats till <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>, bör du ange den till antingen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>, beroende på de celler som rubriken representerar.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>

trans-unit.source: The value of the Scope property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för Scope-egenskapen är lagrade i vyn tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope"> </xref> värden.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope"> </xref>.
